title: Something Inside
text:
There is something inside me
I don't know what it is
Ecco of evil voices
demons of bad will
The evil is trying to break through
make me do somethings
giving me pain to spread
Against my free will
The doctor say i'm crazy
my moma says i'm mad
the priest says i'm a sinner
Fuck i don't know even who i am
There is something inside me
I don't know what it is
Ecco of evil voices
demons of bad will
Now I haven't written
in a couple months
the killing spree has started
My soul has taken the fall
The voices broke me down
the demons took control
they are demanting lifes
they say they need their toll
There is something inside me
I don't know what it is
Ecco of evil voices
demons of bad will
The price is getting higher
They whant me to take my own life
I dry do deny, but it takes me down
They are false and lie
There is something inside me
I don't know what it is
Ecco of evil voices
demons of bad will x3
þetta er bara fyrsta uppkast, á eftir að fínpússast um leið og það verður komið lag við
